about_the_game:
IATA: DFW, ICAO: KDFW
Dallas is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro giving you an additional airport for your controlling challenge. It is the primary international airport serving the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex area in the U.S. state of Texas.

It is the largest hub for American Airlines, which is headquartered near the airport. It is the fourth busiest airport in the world by aircraft movements and the fifteenth busiest airport in the world by passenger traffic in 2017.

Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport has five terminals and 170 gates. Terminals A, C, and E (from north to south) are on the east side of the airport, while Terminals B and D (from north to south) are on the west side.

Limitation: due to the game engine’s limitation we recommend using parallel runways only. Also due to the number of runways during certain scenarios, the Command Window will not show them all.

Features
- Detailed graphic design
- 3D modelled airport buildings
- Detailed 3D modelled terminal(s)

To add more realism to your game, find the Real Color Add-on on FeelThere's website.

name: Tower!3D - KDFW airport

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB dedicated video card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Tower!3D

short_description: Dallas is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro giving you an additional airport for your controlling challenge. It is the primary international airport serving the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex area in the U.S. state of Texas.
